name: Quack Hunt
description:
A VR headset for mobile devices is needed to play this game.

Aim you head to the ducks and hold your aim to shoot them. Try to get as many points as you can and don't let the ducks scape!

A game made in four hours by:

  • Adrián (https://adritake.itch.io/)
  • Ismael (https://leamsy.itch.io/)
  • Lluis (https://luiginor.itch.io/)
